name: SpiderLoop
overview:
What is SpiderLoop? A quick Reference: SpiderLoop is an SEO (Search Engine Optimization) Control Panel, that you install on your web site. Once installed it does several things for your web site.

It will:

â€¢create content for your web site. â€¢allow you to quickly trade links with other SpiderLoop users. â€¢optimize your web site for the search engines by creating and managing your meta tags â€¢allow you to purchase one way back links â€¢It has several plugins available â—¦Create and send your own news letter â—¦Dynamically generate a sitemap for your site â—¦Create and publish Google Base Feeds â—¦Create and publish RSS feeds â€¢Manage Google Adsense code on your pages â€¢Manage banners on your pages.
